parsed.internal_thinking:
I have placed my first settlement on Node 20, which is an excellent starting position providing access to Wood 11 (2 pips), Brick 6 (5 pips), and Sheep 8 (5 pips). This gives me a solid 12-pip base for early expansion. My immediate priority is to find a second settlement location that provides Wheat and Ore, as I currently lack those resources. The search results highlight Nodes 41, 42, and 43 as top-tier targets for the second round, particularly Node 42 with its Wheat 9 and Ore 5 combination (12 pips). 

For this road placement at Node 20, I have three options: towards Node 10, 19, or 21. Node 21 leads toward the Desert (Hex 10), which is suboptimal. Node 10 leads toward Wood 12, which is somewhat redundant since I already have Wood 11. Node 19 is the most strategic choice; it sits between Hex 9 (W11), Hex 8 (B10), and Hex 4 (S8). This direction keeps me in a high-probability resource cluster and moves me toward the center-west of the board, providing better flexibility for future roads and settlements while diversifying my Brick income (moving toward the 10).
parsed.note_to_self: Alice: Placed road at 20-19. First settlement at 20 (W11, B6, S8). Second settlement priority: Wheat/Ore. Target Nodes: 42 (Wh9, O5) or 41 (O5, Wh9, B10).
parsed.say_outloud: I'll place my road heading towards the middle. I'm hoping to find some Wheat and Ore with my second settlement to round out my resources!
